game.manageGameDescription: As game creator you can deposit or withdraw funds from this game. When withdrawing when you set the amount to 0, it will withdraw all available funds. The protocol withdrawl fee 2.5% applies. To deposit more funds please go to create game where you select the same token and you have option to change also the win ratio.

rules.title: Provably Fair On-Chain Game Rules
rules.subtitle: Understanding the Game Mechanics
rules.gameDescription: AVM Satoshi Dice is proovable fair onchain game.
rules.gameRulesDescription1: First, select your probability of winning. For example, if you choose 50%, you can double your deposit. Combination of game win ratio and probability of winning is the game play probability of winning P (Up*Gp=P).
rules.gameRulesDescription2: Then make a deposit to the blockchain game. Deposit will be deposited in block B.
rules.gameRulesDescription3: Few blocks (few seconds) afterwards, all blockchain transactions generate new block. Every block has its seed number which is the input to another block (Thats why its called blockchain).
rules.gameRulesDescription4: Seed is 32 bytes long number. It can be represented in base64, hex or decimal representation. Modulo of the seed of
rules.gameRulesDescription5: will give you from the right side the number R.
rules.gameRulesDescription7: Game uses the R as random input to the game. If R < P
rules.gameRulesDescription8: If R < P user won the game. If R >= P user lost the game and deposit to the game is incresed.
rules.gameRulesDescription9: If player wins, his reward is calculated as deposit / probability of winning. So if user chosen
rules.gameRulesDescription10: as probability of winning and deposited
rules.gameRulesDescription15: Smallest user probability of winning is 0.0001%. Highest is 100%.
rules.gameRulesDescription16: User pays the network fees ~ 0.01 token per game. At algo price $1/Algo, user can play at least 100 games for $1 net worth of the network fees.
rules.gameRulesDescription17: The maximum win amount is 10% of the amount of tokens in the game. The maximum win amount is a value which will transfered from the smart contract to user and includes the deposit amount.
rules.gameRulesDescription18: If you are not of legal age in your country, please do not play the game. Playing may lead to addiction.
rules.whoCanCreateGameDescription1: Anyone who wants to make some tokens in long run, and believes in randomness of the AVM blockchain seed, can create a game. The initial deposit is required. The token to be deposited can be native blockchain token, ASA or ARC200.
rules.whoCanCreateGameDescription2: You can select win ratio for your game (Gp). Win ratio is factor by which a player has smaller chance to win. Win ratio 90% means that if user picked 100% win, at the end his game play probability of winning (P) will be 90%.
rules.whoCanCreateGameDescription3: There are protocol fees in place - deposit and withdrawal fee is 2.5%. The profit sharing fee is 20%. If the user looses against the game, the game receives his deposit minus the profit sharing fee. The profit sharing fee is 1-win game ratio. For game with 90% win game ratio, the profit from deposit
rules.whoCanCreateGameDescription5: tokens. The protocol profit sharing fee is
rules.whoCanCreateGameDescription6: tokens. When creating game with ASA token, 10 native tokens fee applies when signing the smart contract optin transaction.
rules.whoCanCreateGameDescription7: To better decide on the parameters of the game, we recommend that you try the simulation in
